articles.author: Victoria Kennedy
articles.title: Activision copyright strikes seem to confirm Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 title - Eurogamer.net
articles.description: The next Call of Duty game will be Modern Warfare 3, according to DMCA take down notices.
articles.content:
The next Call of Duty game will be formally titled Modern Warfare 3, according to a recent spate of DMCA take down notices reported by leakers. 
Activision is yet to officially announce its next gam… [+3383 chars]

articles.title: McDonald's abuse claims as 100 workers speak out - BBC
articles.description: More than 100 current and recent McDonald's workers tell the BBC about sexual assault, harassment and racism.
articles.content:
A toxic culture of sexual assault, harassment, racism and bullying has been alleged by more than 100 current and recent UK staff at outlets of the fast-food chain McDonald's.

articles.title: Commonwealth Games: 2026 event in doubt after Victoria cancels - BBC
articles.description: Victoria says the cost of the tournament had ballooned to three times original estimates.
articles.content:
The 2026 Commonwealth Games are in doubt after the Australian state of Victoria cancelled its plans to host due to budget blowouts.

articles.title: Social media users are mesmerized by 'terrifying and beautiful' timelapse video of dead deer decomposing over - Daily Mail
articles.description: A timelapse video shares an up-close look at grotesque progressive stages of a decaying deer fawn over the course of five days after it was killed by a vehicle on a Missouri road.
articles.content:
Social media users are calling a timelapse of the progressive stages of a decaying deer fawn over five days 'both terrifying and beautiful.'
